title: 発見: AmianDevSec/Lgpt - Lgpt (Linux GPT) — A command-line interface that leverages LLMs like Gemini, Dee
summary: 新しいプロジェクトを発見: Lgpt (Linux GPT) — A command-line interface that leverages LLMs like Gemini, DeepSeek, and others to simplify and enhance Linux terminal usage. Execute commands, get explanations, and automate workflows using natural language. (⭐0 | 🍴0)
content:
Lgpt (Linux GPT) — A command-line interface that leverages LLMs like Gemini, DeepSeek, and others to simplify and enhance Linux terminal usage. Execute commands, get explanations, and automate workflows using natural language.
